Cube.name: Monthly PR Sales DBH SKU wise

CalculatedMember.name: PR Sales Volume gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Volume])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Volume])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[PR Sales Volume])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Volume]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Volume]))

CalculatedMember.name: PR Sales Unit gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Unit])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Unit])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[PR Sales Unit])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Unit]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Unit]))

CalculatedMember.name: PR Sales CTN gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales CTN])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales CTN])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[PR Sales CTN])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales CTN]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales CTN]))

CalculatedMember.name: PR Sales Amount gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[PR Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: PR Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR Sales Volume]/1000

CalculatedMember.name: PR Sales MT gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[PR Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[PR Sales MT]))

Cube.name: Monthly SE Sales DBH SKU wise

CalculatedMember.name: Net Secondary Sales Volume GR%

CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Unit])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Unit])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Unit])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Unit]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Unit]))

CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free Secondary Sales Volume GR%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Volume])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Volume])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Volume])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Volume]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Volume]))

CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Unit])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Unit])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Unit])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Unit]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Unit]))

CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales CTN])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales CTN])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales CTN])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales CTN]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales CTN]))

CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Secondary Sales Volume GR%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Volume])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Volume])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Volume])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Volume]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Volume]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Secondary Sales Unit GR%

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Secondary Sales CTN GR%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales CTN])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales CTN])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales CTN])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales CTN]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales CTN]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Secondary Sales Amount GR%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: Net Secondary Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Net Secondary Sales Volume]/1000

CalculatedMember.name: Free Secondary Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Free Secondary Sales Volume]/1000

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Secondary Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross Secondary Sales Volume]/10000

CalculatedMember.name: Net Secondary Sales MT%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net Secondary Sales MT]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Secondary Sales MT%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross Secondary Sales MT]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free Secondary Sales MT%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free Secondary Sales MT]))

CalculatedMember.name: SE Volume Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross Secondary Sales Volume]/[Measures].[Target Volume]

CalculatedMember.name: SE MT Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross Secondary Sales MT]/[Measures].[Target MT]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Amount Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross Secondary Sales Amount]/[Measures].[Target Amount]

CalculatedMember.name: PR Volume Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR Sales Volume]/[Measures].[Target Volume]

CalculatedMember.name: PR MT Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR Sales MT]/[Measures].[Target MT]

CalculatedMember.name: PR Amount Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR Sales Amount]/[Measures].[Target Amount]
